claims: {"Claims": ["SDSM is the only party ready to fight for citizens and the future of the state.", "The party has endured time and weather, good and bad, and has always been on guard for the homeland.", "It's not an option for us to give up; SDSM is a party made of solid material."]}

{"Claims": ["SOSM is the only party ready to fight for citizens and the future of the state.", "We are united and strong, we have endured time and weather, good and bad, and always been on the barricades of the homeland.", "SOSM is a party made of solid material. {"Claims": ["It is not too late to change direction.", "SDSM is the only party ready to fight for citizens and the future of the state.", "We will not give up our future, we will unite and be strong."]}

{"Claims": ["We are striving for great support from our strategic partners and friends on our path to full membership in the EU.", "The only ones who have leadership ambitions and knowledge to lead the country along the European path are SDSM, the Alliance for European Identity, and President Stevo Pendarovski", "There is no surrender to European identity!"]}

{"Claims": ["We're aiming for major support from our strategic partners and friends on our path to full EU membership.", "Only SDSM and the Alliance for European Identity, together with President Stevo Pendarovski, have leadership ambitions and knowledge to lead the country along the European path.", "There is no giving up on European identity!"]}

{"Claims": ["Election is between hope and hopelessness.", "We want every citizen of North Macedonia to stay and build their future here, in our country.", "Let's not give up on the future and together let's fight for a better future for all."]}
